story.storykicker: The Himachal Pradesh Public Service Commission (HPPSC) has released an employment notification, inviting interested candidates to apply for the positions of Medical Officer and Assistant Engineer. The last date for the submission of an online application is June 21.
story.storybody:
The Himachal Pradesh Public Service Commission (HPPSC) has released an employment notification, inviting interested candidates to apply for the positions of Medical Officer and Assistant Engineer.

Vacancy details

Total posts: 67

Name of the posts:

Medical Officer: 50

Assistant Engineer (Civil): 17

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

Medical Officer: The candidates interested in applying for this post should possess a recognised medical qualification included in the first or second schedule or part-II of the third schedule (other than licentiate qualifications) of the Indian Medical Council Act, 1956.

Assistant Engineer (Civil): The candidates interested in applying for this post should be holding a degree in civil engineering or its equivalent from an institution/university duly recognised by the central/state government.

Age limit:

The age of the candidates applying for these posts must not exceed 45 years and must be minimum of 18 years.

Selection procedure:

A written test & viva-voce test will be conducted for shortlisting and final selection of the candidates.

Pay scale:

Medical Officer: The selected candidates will be getting a monthly salary of Rs 10,300 to Rs 34,800, along with a grade pay of Rs 5,000.

Assistant Engineer (Civil): The selected candidates will be getting a monthly salary of Rs 15,600 to Rs 39,100, along with a grade pay of Rs 5,400.

How to apply

The candidates interested in these posts are required to apply at the official website, www.hp.gov.in/hppsc.

Important dates

The last date for the submission of an online application is June 21.

Read: Work at Andhra Bank as Security Officer: Apply before June 13

Read: ONGC Jobs 2016: Attend walk-in interview on June 8

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
